column3: went to be with the lord
column6: 2015 after a brief illness at his home
column7: surrounded with his family and friends. he was a member of henard's chapel baptist church. mr. horton was retired from holliston mills after 25 years of service. he also served as custodian of henard's chapel baptist church until his passing. mr. horton was preceded in death by his parents
column9: lloyd horton and melvin horton; sisters-in-law
column10: jean horton and nell horton. he is survived by his wife of 61 years
column14: chuck and donna trent all of rogersville; grandchildren
column19: alicia estep all of rogersville; great-grandchildren
column26: sherry all of rogersville; special sisters-in-law
column32: bob hale of mooresburg; several nieces and nephews. special thanks to amedisys hospice of morristown
column35: sabrina guerrero and chaplain garland long. also special neighbors
column36: judy and j. j. johnson and martha and jerry de. atlay. visitation hours will be 4:00 p. m. to 7:00 p. m.
column40: rogersville. funeral service will be conducted 7:00 p. m.
column43: 2015 in the funeral home chapel with rev. ed cuthrell and pastor rick dinkins officiating. graveside service will be 10:00 a. m.
column46: 2015 at courtney cemetery. online condolences may be made at www. broomefuneralhome. combroome funeral home
column47: rogersville is serving the horton family.
